dipan.quote: Sandrine loves discipline in the areas of web standards and architecture, and is a great teacher in that space.
dipan.author: Dipan Chauhan
dipan.role: Tech Lead at Digital Arts Network

trent.quote: Sandrine not only has extensive knowledge about digital accessibility, but also a way of imparting that knowledge that is clear and concise.
trent.author: Trent Morgan
trent.role: Web Developer at Big Fish Creative

jordan.quote: I've been quite impressed with how you've adapted to a median between our two styles of working considering how little explanation I was able to give you.
jordan.author: Jordan

david.quote: Her feedback and insights on the process and resulting report have provided us with clear and actionable results.
david.full:
Sandrine was involved in an accessability audit for Napier city council.

Her feedback and insights on the process and resulting report have provided us with clear and actionable results.

I would recommend Sandrine and this process to anyone looking to improve their website.
david.author: David Harris
david.role: Information Management Team Leader at Napier City Council
